title: "19 UChicago faculty receive named, distinguished service professorships"
excerpt: "Nineteen University of Chicago faculty members have received distinguished service professorships or named professorships. Profs. Nicholas Epley, Christopher Faraone, Bana Jabri and John Maunsell have received distinguished service professorships."
